title: beastminingpool
author: beastminingpool
content: AnnouncementWelcome to https://beastminingpool.co.uk/. The site itself is fork of a Yiimp based Script We are simple Alt Coin Mining Pool All Fees for either Pool or Solo are 0.5 Fee It has been running since Octoober 1, 2022.As of the time writing this we have three coins  Raptoreum (RTM), Dogecoin (Doge), Bitoreum (BTRM) Plan to add more on request Currrently Working on Adding HelpTheHomeless (HTH) and a few othersWhy use us?Good question • Pool and Solo Mining 0.5 Fee • No Registration Required• Payouts are made automatically every 2 hours for all balances above 0.001, or 0.0001 ( Plan on changing this in the near future suggestions?)• Fully Supports Rented Hash Power from Mining Rig Rentals / Nicehash and many moreAs of right now i'm open to suggestions to adding more coins Lets get hashing!!Support •https://discord.gg/EPbtmrh8KC•https://twitter.com/BeastMiningP00L
